page.title: 13WELSH COUNTRY SAYINGS
page.content: {Mai oer,gadlas lawn}.A cold May_a full stackyard{.Tri peth s'yn fynnu a'r y {gwres.Gwenith,gwenyn a mes}.3 things thrive on heat_wheat,bees and acorns{.Eira man,eira mawr}.Fine snow means heavy falls of snow{.Pyst dan yr {haul,glaw a gawn}.Sunbeams under the sun,a sign of rain.{Niwl o'r mor,glaw {ar ei ol,niwl o'r mynnydd,tes o'r {glenydd.}Mist off the sea,rain follows. Mist off mountain,sunshine for coast.{Cyntaf i'w og,cyntaf i'w {gryman}.First to sow,the first to reap {. Ni saif eira yn mis Mawrth.Ddim mwy {na menyn ar dwymyn torth.}March snow_like butter on warm bread.{Ni {saif eira yn mis Ebrill ddim mwy na {rhynion mewn rhydill.}April snow_like crumbs in a riddle.
